product_name: CliniqueEven Better Eyes Dark Circle Corrector Under Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Even Better Eyes Dark Circle Corrector Under Eye Cream instantly brightens all skin tones.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll skin typesRefreshes tired eyesCooling metal tip helps massage away puffsDermatologist and ophthalmologist testedSafe for contact lens wearersAllergy testedFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESFragranceItem 2248010How To UseUse eye cream twice a day, morning and night. Gently squeeze a small amount of product and glide contoured applicator back and forth across the undereye area. Use finger to smooth in any excess until absorbed. Reapply as needed throughout the day.IngredientsDimethicone, Water / Aqua / Eau, Isostearyl Palmitate, Polyethylene, Polysilicone-11, Butylene Glycol, Ethylene / Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Isononyl Isononanoate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10 / 1 Dimethicone, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Morus Nigra (Mulberry) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Whey Protein / Lactis Protein / Prot√©ine Du Petit-Lait, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Bran Extract, Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure, Cholesterol, Linoleic Acid, Glycerin, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Sucrose, Pyridoxine Dipalmitate, Petrolatum, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer-3, Caffeine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glyceryl Laurate, Quaternium-90 Bentonite, PEG-8, Phytosphingosine, PEG / PPG-18 / 18 Dimethicone, Dimethicone Silylate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use eye cream twice a day, morning and night. Gently squeeze a small amount of product and glide contoured applicator back and forth across the undereye area. Use finger to smooth in any excess until absorbed. Reapply as needed throughout the day.
ingredients: Whey Protein / Lactis Protein / Prot√©ine Du Petit-Lait
Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: This eye brightener goes on smooth and cool.

reviews.headline: purchased to cover dark circles
reviews.comments: This dark circle corrector blends smoothly and doesn't get caught in under eye lines.  The metal tip is gentle on delicate under eye skin and helps with blending.  I pair this with the clinique moisture surge eye cream.  I would definitely recommend tryng this!

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Does nothing to hide my dark circles.   A waste of money and I returned it.

reviews.headline: ineffective
reviews.comments: Been using this product consistently, every day for months and there is absolutely no change in appearance. I only held on because I thought maybe it just takes a bit more time but I think half a year is plenty to know definitively that this doesn't work.

reviews.headline: Happy Customer
reviews.comments: Happy Customer, will buy again.

reviews.headline: Not worth the money
reviews.comments: I haven't noticed any difference with my dark circles.  Product doesn't cover anything.

reviews.headline: So far so good!
reviews.comments: I have been looking for something to combat my hereditary dark under circles. I applied this and instantly saw a dofference. It does have a slight tint to it that brightens as well. I will say that when i put make up on top it does look a little caley so this will be something i use on my "off" make up days. The bottle is a little pricey for the size. I love clinique and know that it works with my sensitive skin which is why i wantwd to give ot a try.

reviews.headline: great but expensive
reviews.comments: I like this product, it works for me. It worked well with my sensitive skin, and makeup. The only problem I have is it's expensive, and that would be fine if the tube was bigger.

reviews.headline: LOVED IT AND WAS WORTH THE PRICE
reviews.comments: Amazing i had no underwye cirlclea or dark spots after a few weeks of using!

reviews.headline: Didn't care for the product at all.  Actually, returned it.
reviews.comments: Product flaked off when I applied foundation.   Not what I was hoping for for under eye area.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again and again
reviews.comments: It's amazing

reviews.headline: This particular brand irritated the area under my eyes.
reviews.comments: The product made my eyes all puffy the next morning, so not sure if it's right for me.

reviews.headline: Nice!
reviews.comments: I love this product. It is very buttery and melts into the skin nicely. I have very pale skin with big purple undereye bags and this product has been very moisturizing and i have noticed a difference in the texture of my underye skin. it is not so chicken-skin like. The texture has been smoothed very nicely!

reviews.headline: It works for me
reviews.comments: I've used a lot of under eye creams. I'm very fair skinned and I've got see through skin with big purple and green veins. My under eyes have always been a huge insecurity. I've only been using this product for a few days and I am just now seeing a positive result after consistent usage. Which is normal with any skincare product. Nothing Will be overnight ever. Don't believe a product if it says overnight results lol. The fragrance is light and my under eyes feel very moisturized and the bags are beginning to fade. Drink plenty of water and get adequate sleep as well as applying this serum.

reviews.headline: The real deal
reviews.comments: Not sure how it will go long term, but it definitely brightens my dark circles! Better than I expected üëç

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: I love it!

reviews.headline: This is it!!!
reviews.comments: Love this product. The applicator makes the product cool on the skin when going on. Covers dark circles and assist with reducing puffiness.

reviews.headline: It's works!
reviews.comments: I've been using this for almost 5 weeks and I can definitely see the results. It's recommended to use twice a day. It's a part of my morning routine, but I don't always remember to use it at night, but I still see results. Clinique products is all I use for skincare and this is been one of my favorites so far. I high recommend if you are sure to be consistent, as you can see, if it's not cheap.

reviews.headline: no results
reviews.comments: so I finished the product and no difference in the dark circle/dark bags under my eyes. the applicator feels amazing but for the price i was hoping at least a small change but there was none.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: It feels cool on the skin as soon as it touches it and doesn't leave a greasy feeling

media.headline: I expect more for the price

faceoff_positive.comments: After using for about 2 weeks, 2 time a day I have noticed a significant change under my eyes. As a guy I'm happy to see a change with this product so much that I've have received complements that my face looks "different". I'll take the compliment and maybe just maybe I'll tell them why!
faceoff_positive.headline: bye dark circles

faceoff_negative.comments: I have tried other products in this line and had great success! I love clinique and have always found them to be gentle and effective, however, within 24 hours of using this, my eyes have started to water almost constantly. When I close my eyes for a few seconds to try and get the tears out, they start to burn. I am incredibly bummed. I had really high hopes but this will have to be returned.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great stuff, just not for me

rollup.name: Even Better Eyes Dark Circle Corrector Under Eye Cream
